item.title: (no title)
item.content:encoded:
Re: Tier;
Unfortunately you forgot a single Tier break, and it's more of a .5 Tier. The Sabotage Facility, that comes after Elemental Beacon.

As for raid difficulties, it varies rather a lot, depending on number of villagers and upgrades, etc. It can range anywhere from around 6 successes needed to 40 successes, with relative difficulties to boot.

item.title: Raiding A village?
item.content:encoded: Can somone put an example of the difficulty/successes needed to pass a raid? I know they're not all the same but i just want to know what range they fall in.

item.title: Tier
item.content:encoded:
Since I can't edit the page (yay Wiki?) I'll post it here.

Ninja World War
- Village Tier

Your Village's Tier is decided by some of its upgrades.
Villages with a War Council are Tier 1 (or T1).
Villages with a War Council and a Natural Research Facility are Tier 2 (or T2).
Villages with a War Council, a Natural Research Facility and an Elemental Beacon are Tier 3 (T3).

Villages can only Spy on and Attack Villages of the same Tier. So to be able to Bingo someone, you also need to be in the same Tier.

item.title: (no title)
item.content:encoded:
The Resupply Village Action gives .5 ZAP to every Villager in the Zombja Map. These ZAP go into a Bank and can be pulled at will by the Zombja fighters.

It also gives the person who did the Action 25 ZP.

item.title: (no title)
item.content:encoded: Oh, and what does resupply do? I know it does something for Zombjas, but what?

item.title: (no title)
item.content:encoded: Attacking only costs 50, but checking the attack difficulty takes 5. As such, you do spend 55. Also, Potion Bases are your friend.

item.title: (no title)
item.content:encoded: There is a mistake, the cost of attacking a village is 55 stamina, not 50. So be careful. I had 0 stamina, and I used warrior's high to get 50 stamina for attack, guess what happened. I wasted 600 arena points.

item.title: Where can I get people...
item.content:encoded: I need people to join my village and I haven't the slightest idea where to get people. If anyone can help me get some people in my village I'd be pumped. Trilby Village- the village hidden in plain sight
